channel.title: How do you stop npcs from attacking? Help!
channel.description:
On my silab server, most of the npc's attack back when you fight them. Most people like this, but i don't, so could someone tell me how to make it so the npc's do not attack you when you attack them.
Thx[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2009, 07:39:17 pm[/size][hr]lol
